Posts.Content: Kitcat22 wrote: Hello everyone, My mom has stage IV mets (stomach, bone, bone marrow, lymph; initial diagnosis, Feb. 2012) and has since started aggressive chemo (TAC).  She is coming up on her 4th round tomorrow, however has been experiencing nausea throughout her entire 3rd round.  She has taken a couple different anti-nausea meds (neither consistently and only after the nausea started).  Has anyone else had nausea throughout?  The other reason I ask, is her oncologist is sending her in for an MRI to see if it might be brain mets causing the nausea since typically nausea doesn't last the entire time.  I REALLY hope not!!!! Daughter: Mother diagnosed Stage IV, mets to stomach, bone, bone marrow and lymph. ER+/PR-, HER2(?). Diagnosed: Feb. 9, 2012 Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Has anyone else experienced nausea throughout chemo rounds? Kitcat22 Kitcat22
